notes: v1.1 Major Update: Added 'Scope' & 'Blitz' themes. Enhanced text/roll detection for both Actor & Item Triggers. Added Global Style templates and multi-trigger support for items. Optimized performance via lazy loading. Fixed PF1 compatibility.

announcement.title: v1.1 Major Update: New Themes & Enhanced Triggers!
announcement.content: This update introduces 'Scope' & 'Blitz' themes, Global Styles, and a massive overhaul to Triggers. Both Actor and Item triggers now feature enhanced roll detection. Setup is easier with Context Menu Hints!
